articles.description: Novak Djokovic says the realities of age have "hit like never before" after a heavy loss to world number one Jannik Sinner in the Wimbledon semi-finals.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025: Novak Djokovic says reality of age 'hits like never before' after loss to Jannik Sinner in semi-finals

articles.description: Spain are through to the quarter-finals of Euro 2025 with a perfect record - so which players are standing out for the world champions?
articles.title: Euro 2025: Alexia Putellas, Esther Gonzalez, Vicky Lopez & Patri - Spain's standout players

articles.description: An almost instant impact after over four years out - Jofra Archer is making up for lost time in Test cricket, writes Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: England vs India: Jofra Archer makes up for lost time in third Test at Lord's

articles.description: Katie Taylor holds a 2-0 advantage over Amanda Serrano as they prepare to meet in New York on Friday, but this third bout is fully warranted.
articles.title: Taylor vs Serrano 3: 'The final chapter of an all-time great sporting rivalry'

articles.description: After winning the FA Cup and qualifying for the Europa League, why are Crystal Palace now set to lose their place to Nottingham Forest?
articles.title: Crystal Palace: Why are Nottingham Forest set to replace them in Europa League?

articles.description: Portugal's hopes of reaching the Euro 2025 quarter-finals ended as they were beaten by Belgium in their final group-stage game.
articles.title: Portugal 1-2 Belgium: Portugal out of Euro 2025 after defeat

articles.description: Liverpool are to retire the number 20 shirt in honour of Diogo Jota, who died in a car crash along with his brother Andre Silva.
articles.title: Diogo Jota: Liverpool to retire number 20 shirt in honour of forward

articles.description: A month on from their epic French Open final, Jannik Sinner and Carlos Alcaraz will meet once more on Sunday in a battle for Wimbledon trophy.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025: Can Jannik Sinner and Carlos Alcaraz serve up another epic in men's singles final

articles.description: Reigning champion Tadej Pogacar regains the race lead as he wins stage seven of the Tour de France.
articles.title: Tour de France 2025 results: Tadej Pogacar wins stage seven

articles.description: Fly-half James O'Connor returns to the Wallabies squad to face the Lions after three years without a cap.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions 2025: James O'Connor in Australia squad named by Joe Schmidt
